In case you don't subscribe to the SD Ruby podcast, we just uploaded a huge batch of fresh episodes.

We've got talks on ActsAsSolr, Edge Rails, Seaside, ActiveRecord Backup & Mimetypefu, JRuby, AJAX CSS stars, Amazon SQS, Capistrano, and more.

There's also a 20 minute talk on Headliner and Styler that I gave back in May.

(Sydney RORO members can skip this one... this is the same talk I did in Australia.)
